title: AD&D Core Rules 2 + Expansion + Forgotten Realms Atlas
description:
Advanced Dungeons & Dragons Core Rules v2 ISO, plus Expansion ISO, plus the Forgotten Realms Atlas ISO. Includes any available or necessary patches/updates and some extra goodies I use in gaming. Other addons are available for the Core Rules + Expansion, and are merely a google search away.

Simply mount with your favourite CD mounting tool (or burn to disk), install & run.
